greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of solution to n/x = x - n for n = 5.
comment: n/x = x - n with n = 1 gives the Golden Ratio = 1.6180339887...
Equals n + n/(n + n/(n + n/(n + ....))) for n = 5.  See also A090388. - _Stanislav Sykora_, Jan 23 2014
link: Chai Wah Wu, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
formula: Equals (5 + 3*sqrt(5))/2 = 1 + 3*phi = sqrt(5)*(phi)^2, where phi is the golden ratio. - _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 03 2017
Minimal polynomial is x^2 - 5x - 5 (this number is an algebraic integer). - _Alonso del Arte_, Apr 20 2020
results.author: Felix Tubiana (fat2(AT)columbia.edu), Feb 05 2004
